name: Root Stew
description:
Run around collecting root vegetables and make a delicious stew!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots" over 3 days.

Developer's notes:

There was a lot I still wanted to add but didn't quite have time, but I'm still happy with how it turned out! Total working time was 16 hours. I wanted to get sound effects and make a little song for the game, but not having enough time to add sound to my jam games seems to be pretty standard at this point haha. 

Everything in the game was made by me. coding and systems, 2D art and textures, 3D level.

Hope you enjoy!
